pr_title: Add regexp validations for tenant ID, device ID, credentials types and auth-ID.

timeline.message:
[#1956] Implement regexp validation for ID through the managament API when creating tenants and devices.
Adding regular expression to validate the characters for credentials auth-id and type fields as wells.

Signed-off-by: Jean-Baptiste Trystram <jbtrystram@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be better to do this check within span, so that we have a proper tracing/logging for the errors. Like it's done for the credentials endpoint.
timeline.author: dejanb

timeline.bodyText: Maybe you can define default regex at one place, like DEFAULT_ID_REGEX and reuse that value.
timeline.author: dejanb
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -116,6 +116,14 @@
      * The vert.x event bus address to which inbound credentials messages are published.
      */
     public static final String EVENT_BUS_ADDRESS_CREDENTIALS_IN = "credentials.in";
+    /**
+     * The regular expression to validate that the auth-id field supplied in credentials is legal.
+     */
+    public static final String AUTH_ID_VALUE_REGEX = "^[a-z0-9-=]+$";

replies.bodyText: I moved the regexp for tenant id and device id to RegistryManagementConstants.DEFAULT_ID_REGEX
replies.author: jbtrystram
